backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing a contact request backend with topic-based submissions, validation, persistent storage, and admin-only query/update APIs secured via access control.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report documenting two completed frontend features related to removing a character age value and conditionally rendering age metadata, including affected files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all major frontend files and components, describing layout, UI sections, hooks, configuration, and deployment docs.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, manga-inspired OKLCH color tokens, base styles, and typography defaults.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that sets the document title and mounts the React application at the root element.
frontend/RUN-LOCAL-AND-DEPLOY-IC.md: Step-by-step guide for running the site locally and deploying it to the Internet Computer, covering prerequisites, commands, and troubleshooting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures React Query and renders all major site sections, navigation, footer, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Section component that displays the anime synopsis from configuration using a shared section header and styled prose layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminSection.tsx: Admin dashboard UI handling Internet Identity authentication, viewing/exporting contact requests, and toggling request status via backend APIs.
frontend/src/components/CharactersSectio: Characters grid component that renders character cards from config with conditionally assembled metadata, including optional age display.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Implements a contact form with email, topic, and message fields, including client-side validation and submission via a React Query mutation. Shows success/error toasts and disables inputs while submitting.
Renders a list of anime episodes from animeSiteConfig with episode numbers, titles, and synopses in a styled section.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a site footer with copyright year and social media links to Twitter and GitHub using icons.
Empty component file; no implementation present.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Empty component file; no implementation present.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the hero banner with background image, title, tagline, CTA buttons, and smooth scrolling to page sections. Includes a scroll indicator icon.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeader.ts: Reusable section header component that displays a styled title with an accent underline.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements a fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, smooth scrolling links, and a responsive mobile menu. Navigation labels and logo come from animeSiteConfig.
frontend/src/components/WorldbuildingSec: Displays structured worldbuilding content such as clans, clan eye rules, power system, rank system, and family lore sourced from animeSiteConfig.
frontend/src/content/animeSiteConfig.ts: Central configuration object containing site metadata, CTA labels, worldbuilding lore, characters, and episode/story data for the anime site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches a backend actor using React Query, handling authenticated vs anonymous identities. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context, provider, and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY AuthClient, managing identity state, login/logout actions, and detailed login status flags across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting, fetching, and updating contact requests via an ICP actor, with automatic cache invalidation on successful mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up global Tailwind CSS styles, OKLCH-based light/dark theme tokens, custom fonts, typography rules, smooth scrolling, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application by creating the root, initializing a React Query client, and wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions to read URL parameters from query strings or hash routing, persist them in sessionStorage, and safely clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode support, content paths, extended OKLCH color tokens, typography, animations, container settings, and additional plugins.
